description: Scene 1: A cinematic macro shot of 3g of pure white BILAN electrolyte powder being delicately spooned into a sleek, modern, transparent sports bottle. The focus is on the fine texture of the powder as it cascades down.
style: photorealistic minimalism, clean aesthetic, cinematic, instructional, refreshing
camera: Macro, slow-motion shot, tightly focused on the powder and the mouth of the bottle.
lighting: Bright, crisp, and clean natural light, evoking a sense of purity and health.
environment: A minimalist, modern kitchen with natural materials and soft light.
elements: 3g of BILAN's fine white electrolyte powder.
motion: Ultra slow-motion pouring of the powder, emphasizing its fine, pure texture.
ending: The last grain of powder settles at the bottom of the bottle, the shot holds for a moment in anticipation.
